item.title: Humanoid Soft-Robotic Hand
item.description:
Made in collaboration with Melbourne Humanoid Robotics lab (cite)

Simple single motor design intended for gripping single objects.

** VIDEO HERE OF GRIPPING **

Desing Decisions

First Prototype Experimenting with finger Contraction

Material Chocies

Chose to use X Filament Had to switch to yada filament

Then had to print the soft skin on the outside which required a secondary skin. Most of the design choices actually came from trial and error.
